basics.name: Cristiano Pedersini
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Computer programmer, fitness devotee and coffee lover. I studied Computer Science in Milano, Italy, where I specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Data Mining. I studied abroad in Brisbane, Australia. I was a research intern in Tokyo, Japan, where I started my career as a software engineer. I would define myself a software developer, with a passionate interest for new experiences, challenges and people. Quick learner, troubleshooter and always constructively critical.

highlights: Video Pipeline (5 months): Web framework for automatic batch generation of data-driven video presentations. Unity, Mono, C#, Ruby on Rails.
Otakyou (2 months): e-commerce web application based on Ruby on Rails, Unicorn and Nginx.
Web application (2 months): Video streaming, purchase and subscription web application with social network features. Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Unicorn and Nginx.
Living Surface (2 months): Interactive application for events. People tracking and realistic interaction with projected visual effects. Unity, Mono, C#, Kinect.
Web/Android (1 months): Mobile web and native Android app, with in app-purchase features. Java, javascript, HTML, Android Webviews.

highlights: Automatic Content Generation for 3D, Online, Virtual Simulators.
Dirty Little Bunnies: Commercial mobile videogame for iOS devices, started as university project. Unity, C# and Xcode.
